    • Constructor Detail

      • Unit

        public Unit(int speed,
    int defense,
    int attack,
    int range,
    int hitPoints,
    String name,
    Player player)
        Basic constructor.
        Parameters:
        speed - how fast unit can move.
        defense - defense modifier
        attack - attack modifier
        range - attack range
        hitPoints - how much damage unit can survive
        name - name of the unit
        player - owner of unit

    • Method Detail

      • setXY

        public void setXY(int x,
         int y)
        Sets the unit's location coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - vertical coordinate, 0 = top of map
        y - horizontal coordinate, 0 = left side of map

      • doneForTheRound

        public boolean doneForTheRound()
        Checks if unit can still move or attack this round.
        Returns:
        true is unit has moved and attacked (or ended turn).

      • isHitAndDies

        public boolean isHitAndDies()
        Checks if unit dies when hit.
        Returns:
        true if hitpoints are 0 (or less).
